## Objectives
1. Identify nutrient trends over time for each monitoring station
2. Compare to the TSS

## Set up
```{r setup, include=FALSE}

library(trend)

library(zoo)

library(Kendall)
```

## Import Datasets
```{r}

```

## TN
```{r}
# Create a time series object
ET8.1_TN.ts <- ts(ET8.1_TN_TP_TSS.Merged$meanTN, start = c(1986,3), frequency =12)

# Generate the decomposition
ET8.1_TN.Decomposed <- stl(ET8.1_TN.ts, s.window = "periodic")

#Visualize the decomposed series
plot(ET8.1_TN.Decomposed)

#Running Mann-Kendall Test
ET8.1.MK.TN <- MannKendall(ET8.1_TN.ts)
ET8.1.MK.TN
summary(ET8.1.MK.TN)

##Visualize with ggplot
ET8.1_TN_plot <- ggplot(ET8.1_TN_TP_TSS.Merged, aes(x=year_month, y=meanTN)) +
  geom_line() +
  geom_smooth(method="loess", se=F) +
  xlab("Year") +
  ylab("Total Nitrogen (mg)")
ET8.1_TN_plot

```
